name: Pet Mouse Secret Life Game
description:
Hey friends, Do you like challenges? Then come and join this game. Pet mouse secret life game has lots of challenges for you like Pop a many mouse, Mouse far jumps, Mouse paint, Mouse skyscraper, inflate the balloon and much more. So use your skills and complete each & every challenge. Here in this game, you can also perform tons of mini-games with a cute mouse. By playing this game your child is to be kept happy as they try to solve all levels and make a good score of each level.

Feature:
- Try a different style of mouse painting
- Yummy flavors of candy
- Collect the bubbles
- Enjoy smallest to the biggest numbering game
- Tap the button for high jump
- Press the button and change the lane
